name: Simple Design: Yahoo! トピックス
description:
余計なものを一切排除しました。
基本的に１カラムです。
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix(http://dailynews.yahoo.co.jp), url-prefix
(http://headlines.yahoo.co.jp) {

.ynbox_side_lr, .ynbox_side, .yjS, .dot_line, yntitle_sub8_l, .yntitle_sub4b, yjSt, .ynbox, 
#footer, #commentbody, .list_ya, .yntitle_sub6, .yntitle_sub5, .yntitle_sub8, .yntitle_sub7_r, 
.yntitle_sub9, .fsy2, div.yjmthloginarea, .yngrouplink, #navi_serch, #ynhead, #ynsubnav,
#ynsubnav2, .box_ct, .yntitle_sub1, body>div:first-child,
table>tbody>tr>td>table:first-child+*+*+*+*+*, body>div[align="center"],
body>hr[width="100%"], body>table>tbody>tr>td:first-child+td,
body>center:first-child+*+*>*:first-child+*+*+*+*+*>tbody>tr>td:first-child+
td, body>center>table td>table[style], body>center>div[align],
body>center>hr[width], body>table>*>*>td>*:first-child+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*
+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*, body>hr, body>small,
body>table>tbody>tr>td>*:first-child+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+
*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*, body>table>tbody>tr>td>table[align="center"],
body small, body>table>tbody>tr>td>*:first-child+*>tbody>tr>*:first-child+td[width],
body>*:first-child+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*, 
body>*:first-child+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*>tbody>tr>td>
table:first-child+*+*+*+*, body>table>tbody>tr>td>table[cellpadding="1"] {

      display: none !important;

     }
body>*:first-child+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*[cellspacing="2"] {width: 800px !important; }
}
